episodes.title: Ep 4: The Roast of Uncle Icky 360
episodes.description:
Ok, Disappointments, hold on to your butts. It’s the Roast of Uncle Icky 360. This week we’re diving into Leandra’s “360 Review” of Uncle Icky as a boss and pastor from back in October of 2018. From inscrutable expectations to labor exploitation, this review gives a peek into Leandra’s experience as an indentured—*COUGH cough* sorry, as an EMPLOYEE of the Living Word cult. FOR COMEDY PURPOSES! And also for healing purposes lol. Join us as we un-gaslight ourselves and unpack past-Leandra’s perspective on:

Uncle Icky’s Management Style (f****n’ L O L)The cost of dissent within the cultConversational manipulation tacticsCLASSIC cult information control structureHow Uncle Icky treated women (and how uncomfortable that was)
CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, Labor Exploitation, Physical and Emotional Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Ab*se and Manipulation, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior and Grooming by Authority Figures, Childhood $*xual Ab*se, THE LITERAL ACTUAL STRUCTURE OF A CULT read from the perspective of someone who had no idea what a cult was, BARN. I repeat, BARN.

episodes.title: Ep 3: Resting Bewildered Face with Mike White
episodes.description:
This week we have a particularly long episode for you, because we couldn’t part with any of the content we loved it so much. Listen at 1.5 speed if you must, but it is a great time the whole way through because this week our guest is Mike White! Former TLW member and “blow out,” he is also the guest of our sisterbrothermother podcast, Snapping Out Of It! Enjoy the madness as we get into topics like:

• The true meaning of RBF 
• Reclaiming your creativity after musical trauma 
• Recognizing red flags in relationships 
• The moment you realize pastors can’t read minds 


CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Ab*se, Physical and Emotional Ab*se, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Abuse and Manipulation, $*xually Inappropriate Behavior and Grooming by Authority Figures, Childhood $*xual Ab*se, The Ever-Present Danger of Diddlers, Word For The World, Big Boney Energy, Mommy and Daddy Issues.

episodes.title: Ep 2: Heavy Meddling With Charity Navalesi
episodes.description:
Ladies, Theydies, and Gentlefriends, we present: OUR FIRST GUEST! She is an incomparable multidisciplinary artist, she is the WICKedly talented host of the podcast “Oops I’m In A Cult!” She is the one and only: Charity Navalesi.  Join us as we cackle, weep, hyperventilate, and emotionally regulate our way through topics like: 

* The search for healthy healing tools 
* Navigating pesky attachment patterns
* Rock bottom’s bottom 
* Sweatin’ it out for Jesus 
* Where not to put garlic 

CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Religious and Spiritual Abuse, High Control Environments/Relationships, Narcissistic Abuse and Manipulation, Inscrutable Sexual Analogies, Heavy Meddling, Garlic Snatch

episodes.title: Ep 1: The Disappointment Begins
episodes.description:
In our very exciting first episode, we'll be giving you, dear listener, some context on who we are, what the heck this show is, and why we can't stop crying at the grocery store! (It’s the trauma.) Tune in to hear us ramble on about all of this and more as we discuss:
The cult from whence we cameLeaving a harmful environment and the messy feelings that followThe power of sharing stories, even the painful onesThe all-too-relatable story of getting groped in the Pope Room at Bucca Di Beppo   (You know the one)
CONTENT TRIGGER WARNINGS:  Sexual and Physical Abuse, Childhood Sexual Abuse, Religious and Spiritual Abuse, Bucca Di Beppo
